content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Hassan. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the square footage and current market rates, I was thinking of charging 1,500 Euros per month. However, I'm open to negotiation and willing to consider a lower price if you have any specific concerns or requirements. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,400 Euro per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 1,400 Euros per month, Hassan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and look forward to having you as a tenant. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Ok, thank you. I am very happy to have you as my landlord. I will pay 1,400 Euros per month on the first day of each month. Do you accept online payments?
I will sign the lease agreement in front of you and your witness.
I will hand you the first month's rent on the day I move in.
Do you have any other requirements or conditions I should be aware of?
Do you have any references I can contact?
Do you have any other questions or concerns I can help you with?
Thank you again for your understanding and cooperation.

Sincerely,
Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your prompt response, Hassan. I am glad to hear that you will be paying the monthly rental of 1,400 Euros on the first day of each month and that you will sign the lease agreement in front of me and my witness. I do accept online payments, so you can easily pay your rent through my online portal.

As for any other requirements or conditions, I would like to remind you that smoking is not allowed in the apartment and that you are responsible for keeping the apartment clean and in good condition. If you have any questions or concerns about these or any other matters, please don't hesitate to bring them up during the signing of the lease agreement.

In terms of references, I do have a few previous tenants that you can contact if you would like to verify my reputation as a landlord. I will provide you with their contact information upon request.

I appreciate your prompt and professional response, Hassan, and look forward to having you as my tenant. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
